scripts.test:user-guid: tsc utils/userGuid.ts --target ES2017 --module commonjs --outDir dist-test && node tests/unit/user-guid.unit.test.js

scripts.test:design-concepts: tsc lib/services/designConcept.ts --target ES2017 --module commonjs --esModuleInterop --outDir tests && node tests/integration/design-concept.integration.test.js
scripts.test:design-evaluation: tsc lib/services/designEvaluation.ts --target ES2017 --module commonjs --esModuleInterop --outDir tests && node tests/integration/design-evaluation.integration.test.js
scripts.test:spec-selection: tsc lib/services/specSelection.ts --target ES2017 --module commonjs --outDir tests && node tests/integration/spec-selection.integration.test.js
